title: "Artificial intelligence helped find a huge copper deposit in Zambia. It could shift the power balance in the region"
excerpt: "The mining company KoBold Metals successfully used AI technology to locate a massive copper deposit in Zambia. Among other things, the discovery could help the U.S. compete with China in the lucrative «green metals» business."
